item.title: Eckhart Tolle Reveals How to Silence the Voices in Your Head - SuperSoul.tv
item.description:
Eckhart Tolle Reveals How to Silence the Voices in Your Head - SuperSoul.tv

When we announced on Facebook that Eckhart Tolle and Oprah were sitting down once again, questions for Eckhart began pouring in. Watch as he answers two of your most burning questions: How do you calm the voice in your head, and how can you clear your mind of bad memories?

item.title: Soul to Soul with Eckhart Tolle - SuperSoul.tv
item.description:
Soul to Soul with Eckhart Tolle - SuperSoul.tv

Where does spiritual teacher Eckhart Tolle feel most at home? Is he always happy? Watch this lightning round of Soul to Soul questions and see which answer made Oprah laugh out loud.

item.title: Eckhart Tolle: The Awakening of Consciousness - SuperSoul.tv
item.description:
Eckhart Tolle: The Awakening of Consciousness - SuperSoul.tv

He's the man Oprah calls the "rockstar of the spiritual movement." In this enlightening SuperSoul Session, author Eckhart Tolle explains the awakening of consciousness by taking on one of Oprah's signature questions: What do you know for sure? "I know for sure that I'm sitting on a chair," Eckhart says.
